title: Functions & Syntax
description: Master function signatures, defaults, *args/**kwargs, and returns.

workshops.title: Safe Divider (defaults + error guard)
workshops.prompt: Implement safe_divide(a, b, default=0) that returns a/b. If b==0, return default.
hints: Hint 1: Use 'if b == 0:' early-return the default.
Hint 2: No exceptions needed for this one.
Hint 3: Make 'default' a keyword with a sensible default.

workshops.title: *args/**kwargs Echo
workshops.prompt: Implement echo_signature(*args, **kwargs) that returns a tuple: (list(args), sorted list of (key,value) pairs by key).
hints: Hint 1: list(args) gives a list of positional args.
Hint 2: kwargs.items() can be sorted by key.
